title: How did Lee Sin get a boxing skin before Vi?

replies.body:
From MegaGFilms, they make some crazy stuff that has me laughing - but some people just don't get it.

https://youtu.be/aaSRYecKaqc

Something we talk about a lot on the skins team is 'alternate fantasies'; basically what can we deliver in a skin that players of that champion would love but don't get with the base. Boxing Vi is a redundancy of her base in a way because she is already all about punching (doesn't mean we couldn't do this skin though) while Lee Sin, being our resident Street Fighting/Matial Arts guy would make an exciting boxer with punches for kicks kind of like Balrog.
muay thai is kind of similar tho
Meanwhile lee'sin with a gajilion kung fu related skins. Alternate fantasies. Yep.

> [{quoted}](name=Saminus Maximus,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IAoOpztf,comment-id=00070004,timestamp=2015-05-14T02:14:53.795+0000)
>
> Meanwhile lee'sin with a gajilion kung fu related skins. Alternate fantasies. Yep.

he kinda has a point riot. you say its redundant to give Vi a boxing skin since its fits her so...... kettle meet pot?

I can't really speak to the choices made 3 years ago as that was a wild west I wasn't a part of. But I'd say we have learned a lot since then and probably would approach those skins differently today.

Honestly i'm sure the player base has 0 problem with skins being similar to the original theme as long as it is visually appealing. Personally my mine grip is how skins are distributed based on popularity instead of who needs a new one most. Eg, lee sin has had 1-2 skins every year, since his release in 2011. Yorrick hasn't had a single skin in those 4 years despite there being many great ideas for alternate fantasies. He literally hasen't had a single skin since he came out that wasn't there on release. Just because a champ is unpopular both with the player base and with riot (Based on whats been said about him) doesn't mean they should just be left to rot.

I don't known who came up with that backwards logic, but it kinda reminds me of the balance department.

Sure some alternate skins are nice too, but those obvious skin are great exactly because they are  obvious.
But you'll still keep them on sale instead of having integrity
In that case, when are we going to get a Vi skin where she wears giant hex-tech boots and kicks people to death?

If we felt that was the coolest idea for a Vi skin, sure why not. But Lee Sin isn't all about kicking the way Vi is all about punching so it makes more sense for him. If we were looking to do a Vi skin with no new animation or particles then a boxer would be a good way to go.

I dunno, Lee Sin's ult is all about the kicking, and his entire theme is 'kung fu', so forcing him into a fighting style that looks off on him is kinda strange.

Does he even need a new skin? I really like the recall animation, but it makes me remember pool party Lee Sin having a recall animation, and comparing it to several champion who have no skins with recall animations.

Have you had a look at the new skin's animations? His new R feels really good!

He hasn't had a new skin in over a year and that was an eSports skin, the same amount of time since Zed's last skin and longer than Vi's last skin. We try to make sure champions get skins whether they are super popular or not because every champion is important. Of course I'm going to get ahead here by saying that some champions that are getting reworked right now are off the table, but aside from those few we really want to make skins for all the champions and if it's been a while then there are good reasons for it - there's no favouritism or conspiracy.
Yorick has been slated for a rework since 2011?
im sorry but when it comes to lee sin, his one year of no skin beats zac's two years of no skin. (sarcasm)

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IAoOpztf,comment-id=00070003000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-14T07:31:54.412+0000)
>
> Have you had a look at the new skin's animations? His new R feels really good!
> 
> He hasn't had a new skin in over a year and that was an eSports skin, the same amount of time since Zed's last skin and longer than Vi's last skin. We try to make sure champions get skins whether they are super popular or not because every champion is important. Of course I'm going to get ahead here by saying that some champions that are getting reworked right now are off the table, but aside from those few we really want to make skins for all the champions and if it's been a while then there are good reasons for it - there's no favouritism or conspiracy.

But we don't want to play Lee Sin : /

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IAoOpztf,comment-id=00070003000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-14T07:31:54.412+0000)
>
> Have you had a look at the new skin's animations? His new R feels really good!
> 
> He hasn't had a new skin in over a year and that was an eSports skin, the same amount of time since Zed's last skin and longer than Vi's last skin. We try to make sure champions get skins whether they are super popular or not because every champion is important. Of course I'm going to get ahead here by saying that some champions that are getting reworked right now are off the table, but aside from those few we really want to make skins for all the champions and if it's been a while then there are good reasons for it - there's no favouritism or conspiracy.

Zac says hi .. and then cries himself to sleep

His Q is okay, though I prefer the flying kick, but his ult lacks the impact that a roundhouse kick does.

Still waiting for a Zac skin. Summers coming up; pool party Zac makes all kinds of sense. Yes, yes, I know, stretchy model makes life hard, but there are so many options I'm not sure why you haven't picked one. I'm sure Zac mains would prefer something less than perfect to nothing, you know?

So Zed's E$port$ skin counts as a skin against him but not Lee Sin... Cause that's what your comment comes off as saying. 

Source

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=4j7pnN0n,comment-id=000000020002000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T23:35:58.375+0000)
>
> Are you referring to SKT T1 Zed? Yes, that counts as a skin for him. Esports skins count as skins for champions in any case.
How bout that {{champion:154}}  skin tho? No new skin in over 2 years and only skin is launch skin, gib him some love pls
Would her ult be an axe kick?
It could be like rock lee running up to them planting his hands on the ground and kicking them in the bottom of the jaw
Wouldn't they need to kick them down, not up?
well she does an upper cut then a slam so mix the 2 XD
CAPOEIRA VI wHEN!?

Shut up.  Just shut up.  Don't even try to pretend that "rough back-alley gym boxer" is not alternate enough to "high tech steampunk machinist"

Just, seriously.  Boxer Vi has been floating around the community long before this shit.  It's what we wanted, but again you just sit in a room with your like-minded coworkers and conclude on things first, then come to "discuss" it with the community.

Vi is already a champion with a ton of alternative fantasies; Steam punk, cyber punk, cop, even "debonair" which makes no god damn sense.  She could have USED this.

VI IS VI.  How the fuck do you get off saying "Uhh, this skin is too much like her base because punching"?  EVERY SKIN will be about punching people, that's who VI is.

But it's too late it's too fucking late huh?  It's all done and nobody will pretend to give a shit unless it's to save face.  Can you show me a SINGLE PERSON among the millions of your PAYING CUSTOMERS who asked for "Boxer Lee Sin?"

Well put! 
{{champion:254}} Approved!
But Lee has Muay Thai...come on Kindlejack I believe in u
I don't see how 'alternate fantasies' have to be solely focused on the 'new style of attack' when it could just as easily be about the style of dress, since it is a skin after all.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IAoOpztf,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-14T00:04:38.593+0000)

Boxing Vi is a redundancy of her base in a way because she is already all about punching (doesn't mean we couldn't do this skin though) while Lee Sin, being our resident Street Fighting/Matial Arts guy would make an exciting boxer with punches for kicks kind of like Balrog.

But you give lux three military skins when her base is already that lol
Except he has a boxing skin already?

Yo!

So, Knockout Vi is still a skin that can happen in the future! I mean we generally don't stop after one skin....or five. :3

sorry, I didnt downvote your post but I should have that is just the worse or at least the 6th worse thing I have seen on boards 

GOD damnit no jokes with roman numerals plz
Don't be so {{champion:254}}olent.
NO just NO please I cant handle that.
Sorry, but it's just the {{champion:254}}be my comments have.
well then delete Lee and get to work on Vi

basically 

"because we didnt lol deal with it"
Why did leesin even get a skin when zed hasnt gotten one. (Both got the skt skin at the same time but zed only had 2 skins at that point)
Cause Rito.
See: Boom Boom Blitzcrank
Yeah but that was a skin before Vi was even out, so it's fine. Most of Lee's animations aren't even punching animations!
They are giving him a bunch of new animations with it. Apparently he now doesn't kick with this skin. (from what i have seen)
Still waiting for Baker {{champion:80}}, Riot. Can I still have that in the future?
I have a new favorite gif.

Muay Thai is a martial art of using your knees and elbows as well as your other body parts, (fists, feet, etc.) so technically,{{champion:64}} deserved that skin more than {{champion:254}}. Remember kids, Muay Thai is not boxing, it is a completely different art and I think people these days should look something up before they talk about it. {{champion:64}}

No.
They're making a new skin for lee sin.

Riot realized that with cinder hulk, tanks were new meta. So they made a lee skin in hopes of having people play him again and remember how toxic he is ( in their words : "fun") 
This is a plot to bring lee back >.>
Im just gonna keep suggesting sockboy/sock puppet zac.
If we have Blitzcrank, Lee Sin, and Vi, we just need a Middle and ADC boxer champions to have a full on brawl team.
Meanwhile Yorick, Zac.
